resource-agent.name: fence_gce
resource-agent.shortdesc: Fence agent for GCE (Google Cloud Engine)
resource-agent.longdesc: fence_gce is an I/O Fencing agent for GCE (Google Cloud Engine). It uses the googleapiclient library to connect to GCE. googleapiclient can be configured with Google SDK CLI or by executing 'gcloud auth application-default login'. For instructions see: https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/tutorials/python-guide
